description: Synthetic RAPID-MOCHA inspired overturning streamfunction series with van Westen indicator used for UTAC V3 pipeline rehearsal.

control_parameter_R.description: Atlantic surface temperature anomaly forcing freshwater flux and convection strength.

response_sigma.description: Normalised distance to the bifurcation where FovS flips sign.

threshold_estimates.zeta_R: ζ(R) captures wind-stress and freshwater impedance; high ζ delays collapse despite weakening streamfunction.

preprocessing_steps: Generate 10-day cadence AMOC transport record (2004-01 to 2024-09)
Compute van Westen FovS indicator and AR(1) proxy

sources.name: van Westen et al. (2024)
sources.citation: Physics-based early warning signal shows AMOC is on tipping course

falsification_notes: Real RAPID data must maintain ΔAIC ≥ 18 advantage vs. linear drift and preserve FovS sign transitions.
